content: 70dc through outer loops 8dc tail make 1 msm 86sts make either a magic magic_ring or a 3ch slip_stitch *all rounds from now on are worked through into first chain ring work in rounds with rs facing the outer loops of every stitch until finished * round 1 6dc into ring pull tail tight psm round 32 1dc decrease 8dc x 4 4dc 8dc 6sts decrease x 4 1dc msm 78sts rounds 2 - 40 double_crochet around msm about 27cms round 33 double_crochet around msm 78sts long 6sts round 34 1dc decrease 7dc x 4 4dc 7dc round 41 create tassel on end of tail * 1dc decrease x 4 1dc msm 70sts 30ch 1dc into next st 30ch* rept from *to * round 35 double_crochet around msm 70sts 6 times slip_stitch into top of 1st double_crochet 6sts & 12ch loops round 36 1dc decrease 6dc x 4 4dc 6dc fasten_off do not leave long tail decrease x 4 1dc msm 62sts round 37 double_crochet around msm 62sts mane round 38 1dc decrease 5dc x 4 4dc 5dc *work back and forth along the front loops that decrease x 4 1dc msm 56sts round 39 double_crochet around msm 54sts were not worked when crocheting the head * round 40 1dc decrease 4dc x 4 4dc 4dc row 1 re-join yarn to 1st front loop on head in decrease x 4 1dc msm 46sts round 27 1dc 40ch 1dc x 34 40ch 1dc turn round 41 1dc decrease 3dc x 4 4dc 3dc 70sts & 35ch loops decrease x 4 1dc msm 38sts page 5 copyright © 2008 fiona kelly make for yourself but do not sell do not copy and distribute or sell this pattern thanks for respecting copyright any queries email me at creative textiles@btinternet com & see more of my designs at http //fionakelly wordpress com/ mane continued mane continued row 2 1dc 40ch 1dc x 11 flatten ears round 26 1dc 40ch 1dc x 7 do not turn attach 1st ear by working 7dc through both psm 14sts & 7ch loops layers of ear & next 7 front loops 1dc 40ch round 27 1dc 40ch 1dc x 2 do not turn slip_stitch 1dc x 6 attach 2nd ear by working 7dc through into top of 1st double_crochet rsm 4sts & 2ch loops do not both layers of ear & next 7 front loops 1dc leave long tail 40ch 1dc x 11 turn 70sts & 28ch loops round 28 1dc 40ch 2dc do not turn rsm row 3 - 6 1dc 40ch 1dc x 34 40ch 1dc 3sts & 1ch loop fasten_off turn 70sts & 35ch loops eyes make 2 row 7 1dc 40ch 1dc x 34 40ch 1dc fasten using oddments of black & white yarns off 70sts & 35ch loops do not leave long tail make either a magic magic_ring or a 3ch slip_stitch *from now on continue mane into first chain ring work in rounds with rs facing by working in rounds * black 9dc
